extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: This is SampleAdBlocker Extension. You should tell us what your extension does here.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

popup_action_delete_user_rules.message: Delete all user rules for this site

popup_modal_desc_enhanced_performance.message: Good job! Now AdGuard will block even more ads, dealing with the most difficult challenges!

popup_modal_desc_almost_there.message: You've allowed AdGuard to work only on this website, which means that it won't block ads on other websites unless you grant the permission next time.

popup_modal_desc_free.message: Mind that you miss out on advanced protection that's not available in the free version. It will help deal with more ads, including YouTube ads in Safari.

support_swipe_title.message: Uh-oh, was that a swipe up?

support_swipe_desc.message: If anything's wrong, let us know and we will fix it.

support_desc.message: Uh-oh, looks like you've disabled the protection... Is something wrong? We can fix it!

modal_protection_off_extensions.message: Tap on Safari and choose the Extensions menu item
